--- title: NetEA Tournament Pack Website hide_nav: true; ---

NetEA Tournament Pack

The NetEA Tournament Pack contains the unmodified Epic Armageddon game rules and errata that used to be found on Games Workshop's website. It includes the rules, FAQ and all of the NetEA Approved army lists that are listed below.

    {% assign tp = site.data['pages']['tournament-pack']['index.html'] %} {% include page_link.html page=tp %}

Rules

The following rules are the unmodified Epic Armageddon game rules and errata that used to be found on Games Workshop's website.

    {% assign rules = site.data['pages']['rules']['index.html'] %} {% include page_link.html page=rules %}

Army Lists

NetEA Approved army lists are tournament ready and balanced against one another using the Epic tournament game rules. They vary slightly from the those that used to be found on Games Workshop's website due to community feedback.

    {% for al in site.army_lists %}{% assign al = site.data.army_lists[al] %} {% include page_link.html page=al %}{% endfor %}

FAQ

The following FAQ have been expanded and updated from those that used to be available on Games Workshop's website.

    {% assign faq = site.data['pages']['faq']['index.html'] %} {% include page_link.html page=faq %}
